LanguageData.BS_ScaleAnimals: Apply Scaling and other behaviour to Animals
LanguageData.BS_LowestUsed: Note: LOWEST of Multiplicate and Linear damage will be used for each given attack.
LanguageData.BS_MultDamageExplain: Multiplicative damage change from size. 0 = no increase. 1 = linear increase.
LanguageData.BS_FlatDMGExplain: Flat bonus to all attacks per size-level.
LanguageData.BS_NutritionBurnExplain: Nutrition Burn. 0.0 = no change. 1.0 = Modified based on body size.
LanguageData.BS_HeadSizeExplain: Head Size of large pawns. Higher Value = Large Head.
LanguageData.BS_HeadExponentSmallExplain: Change head size of small pawns. Smaller Values = Larger Head.
LanguageData.BS_NormalizeBodyType: Normalize bodytype scale for Hulka and Fat (Recommended).
